706.question: By how much, the proposed method improves BiDAF and DCN on SQuAD dataset?

5-Table1-1.png: The proposed method improves BiDAF by 38.02% and DCN by 60.79% on the SQuAD dataset.</s>
The proposed method improves BiDAF by 38.02% and DCN by 60.79% on the SQuAD dataset.</s>

706.answer: In terms of F1 score, the Hybrid approach improved by 23.47% and 1.39% on BiDAF and DCN respectively. The DCA approach improved by 23.2% and 1.12% on BiDAF and DCN respectively.
